```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
cleaning_dictionary <- read_csv("datasets/cleaning_dictionary.csv")

hh <- read_sav("datasets/hh.sav") |> 
  arrange(HH1,HH2) |> 
  select(HH1, HH2, HC1A, 
         HC7A,HC7B,HC9A,HC11,
         HC12,HC13,ST2_1:ST3_4,HH48,
         HHSEX, HHAGE,helevel)

wm <- read_sav("datasets/wm.sav") |>
  select(HH1,HH2,starts_with(c("FN","LS")),windex5,
         VT20:VT22X,MT1:MT5,MT9:MT12,zone, HH6, 
         WAGE, MSTATUS, WB18, welevel, ethnicity,
         WM14, DV1A, DV1B, DV1C, DV1D, DV1F, 
         wmweight,PSU,) |> 
  left_join(hh, by = c("HH1","HH2")) |> 
  matchmaker::match_df(
    dictionary = cleaning_dictionary,
    from = "from",
    to = "to",
    by = "col"
  ) |> 
  mutate(across(FN3A:FN4NR, 
                ~case_when(
                  . == "?" ~ 0,
                  . == "" ~ 0,
                  is.na(.) ~ as.numeric(NA),
                  TRUE ~ 1
                ) |> as.numeric()
  )) |> 
  mutate(across(where(is.character), ~na_if(., ".missing")),
         across(where(is.numeric), ~ifelse(. == -99999, NA, .))) |> 
  mutate(
    HHAGE_CAT = epikit::age_categories(
      HHAGE,
      lower = 15,
      upper = 60,
      by = 5
    )
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    HHAGE_CAT = case_when(
      HHAGE_CAT == "15-19" ~ 1,
      HHAGE_CAT == "20-24" ~ 2,
      HHAGE_CAT == "25-29" ~ 3,
      HHAGE_CAT == "30-34" ~ 4,
      HHAGE_CAT == "35-39" ~ 5,
      HHAGE_CAT == "40-44" ~ 6,
      HHAGE_CAT == "45-49" ~ 7,
      HHAGE_CAT == "50-54" ~ 8,
      HHAGE_CAT == "55-59" ~ 9,
      HHAGE_CAT == "60+" ~ 10,
      .default = NA
    )
  )
```
